title: Britney Spears poses in a bikini and thigh-high socks while taking a stretch break at a yoga studio
text:
She may be in paradise, but that doesn't mean Britney Spears skips out on her workout routine.

The Baby One More Time hitmaker took to Instagram on Monday evening to share a photo of herself in a yoga studio while in Maui on vacation.

Britney took the mirror selfie while stretching in a bikini and thigh-high white socks before admitting that her phone was out of icloud storage and she lost some studio footage.

Me time: Britney Spears took to Instagram on Monday evening to share a photo of herself in a yoga studio while in Maui on vacation

'So I found this adorable simple yoga studio in Maui ... I tried to start off by doing yoga but I danced the first 20 minutes and let go ..... I finished with stretching, splits and yoga!' the 37-year-old wrote.

'Most of the year I did a lot of heat yoga, and I over did it. I prefer cardio and dancing now !!! My trip to Maui was amazing, but I lost 7 hours of footage because my phone didn't have a back up plan. I was extremely upset ... I had 3 outside videos and 7 pics and hotel footage ... but anyhow ... I kept moving forward !!! Oh, and at night the studio had baby twinkle lights .. I preferred nights ... it was magical.'

Over the past couple of weeks the Toxic singer has been sharing photos of the island while taking the time to 'transition in her life and focus on what she really wants.'

Another post: On Monday, Spears also shared another post that said 'You can't teach heart' while writing underneath 'I love you all'

In the photo, her long dark her was in loose waves as it hung down one side of her shoulder.

Her white bikini top had ruffles that went up into the tiny straps.

She paired the time white top with a pair of black cheeky bottoms as she got ready for another sweat session.

The singer made sure to show off her toned abs while giving a small smile into the mirror while looking at her phone for the photo.

Performer: Britney is pictured above during the Piece of Me Summer Tour in the O2 Arena in London back in August 2018

At the end of September, the mother-of-two took to her Instagram to ask fans not to forget about her.

'I hope y'all haven't forgotten about me!!! I'm taking this transition in my life to focus on what I really want ... I've been working nonstop, well, since I was 8 years old in the business. Sometimes it's good to stop and reflect !!!! Miss you all ... I really do have the best fans in the world !!! #fbf,' she wrote with a couple of throwback photos.

Back in January, she called off her Domination shows in Las Vegas due to her father's illness.

Her rep released a statement calling it 'an indefinite work hiatus' before continuing: 'She has made this decision to devote all of her time to her family and their efforts to care for her father during his recovery from a recent life-threatening illness.'

Hitmaker: Britney is pictured above at the 102.7 KIIS FM Jingle Ball show in 2016
description:
She may be in paradise, but that doesn't mean Britney Spears skips out on her workout routine.
The Baby One More Time hitmaker took to Instagram on Monday evening to share a photo of herself.
